Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 25th overall pick, by Oakland in 1983...
Injured on 6/4/1985 with a Bruised Jaw, out for 6 days...
Injured on 9/1/1985 with a Broken Finger, out for 4 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/6/1986, off Jay Franklin (MIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/11/1986, off Dewey Robinson (BAL)...
Injured on 9/1/1988 with a Fractured Cheekbone, out for 6 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 7 RBI against New York (A) on 6/1/1989...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
Hit for the cycle against Baltimore on 9/3/1991...
Won Gold Glove Award at Third Base in 1991...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles on 2/7/1992 to a 5-year deal worth $12,400,000 per year...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1992, hitting .302 with 5 HR, 20 RBI...
Drove in 8 runs against New York (N) on 10/4/1992...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/23/1993, hitting .462 with 4 HR, 10 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/1993, hitting .375 with 16 HR, 34 RBI...
Was selected to the 1993 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/18/1993, hitting .429 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
Won MVP Award in 1993, hitting .269 with 42 HR, 104 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Atlanta on 7/31/1994...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/4/1994, hitting .519 with 4 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Gold Glove Award at Third Base in 1994...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 2/10/1997 to a 3-year deal worth $3,390,000 per year...
